title: padamE shatam
sahitya:
(rAgA:  cenjuruTi)   
  padamE shatam enap-paNIvOm idaya pUrvamAi nidamE murugan


anupallavi

  gati perak-karuNAnidhiyAgum avanai tudi sheiduyyum matiyaip-peravE
				(rAg  nAdanAmakriyA)


caraNam 1    cenni malai mEvum mannavanaik-kaNDu sEvittAl janma sAphalyam uNDu
kunrakkuDikkOr kAvaDiyaik-koNDu kUttADi senrAl kunrA nalam uNDu
